#summary System requirements for Joomla Captcha.

=System requirements=

 * Joomla! 1.5.8
 * PHP 5 with
  * GD Support  enabled
   * GD Version  bundled (2.0.34 compatible)
   * FreeType Support  enabled
   * FreeType Linkage  with freetype
   * FreeType Version  2.1.9
   * JPG Support  enabled
 * Apache or IIS, Fire Fox or IE
